title: Cran-Apple Turkey Skillet
directions: In a large skillet, combine apples, cider, broth, cranberries and nutmeg; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, covered, 4-5 minutes or until apples are tender, stirring occasionally.
Stir in turkey and stuffing mix. Cook, covered, 2-3 minutes or until liquid is almost absorbed. Yield: 6 servings.
ingredients: 2 medium apples, peeled and thinly sliced
3/4 cup apple cider or unsweetened apple juice
1 package (6 ounces) corn bread stuffing mix
